member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_OCTET_STRING_VALUE
member.summary: The CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_OCTET_STRING_VALUE structure specifies the OCTET_STRING value type of the claim security attribute.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_OCTET_STRING_VALUE.pValue
member.summary: A pointer buffer that contains the OCTET_STRING value. The value is a series of bytes of the length indicated in the ValueLength member.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_OCTET_STRING_VALUE.ValueLength
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the OCTET_STRING value.
